decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.


REASON:  To comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out, completed and retained in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:

46-WD-101 B, 46-WD-102 B (Dated 14.06.2022), 46-WD-103 B, 46-WD-104 A, 46-WD-105-B, 46-WD-106 B, 46-WD-107 B

REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

REASON: To safeguard the character and appearance of the area in accordance with Core Policy CS1.B of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012) and Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).

Condition : 4 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.


REASON: To safeguard the residential  amenities of neighbouring residents, in accordance with Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).

Condition : 5 - The two storey side extension, hereby permitted, and the host dwelling shall be occupied at all times as a single residential dwelling. The property including all extensions shall not be subdivided and used as two or more separate self-contained residential units at any time without the permission of the Local Planning Authority. 

REASON: To safeguard the amenity of neighbouring residents and the character of the locality in accordance with Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).

Condition : 6 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s), other than those shown on the approved plans shall be installed in the flank elevation(s) of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.

REASON: To safeguard the residential  amenities of neighbouring residents, in accordance with Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
description: Single storey front extension incorporating porch; single and two storey side extension; single storey rear extension; installation of air source heat pump to rear at ground floor level; external steps to rear (Demolition of conservatory and rear extension)
